item.title: What you should consider in every task you do
item.description: Introduction States Initial/Idle Loading Success Error Empty Components Atomic Design Rules User Experience (UX) Is there any interaction stuck? Is there any strange behavior? (e.g. back animation, scroll, etc) Layout consistency (Spacing, Typography, Colors, etc) Tests Unit Integration UI Documentation
